text: Kristin Cavallari Opens Up About Her Brother ’ s Bipolar Disorder & Substance Abuse After Emotional Hollywood Medium Reading Tyler Henry once again hits the spiritual nail on the head. The clairvoyant connected with Kristin Cavallari ‘ s late brother Mike in the season premiere of Hollywood Medium, and made some startling discoveries about Mike ’ s mental state when he was alive. Related : Kristin Is Getting Her Own Reality Show! After a bit of a struggle, Tyler revealed his otherworldly advisors wanted him to talk about the “ two factors ” that played into Mike ’ s health, acknowledging that “ drugs and alcohol ” may have triggered some debilitating condition.
